name: ArmorStandEntityHelper
description: The `ArmorStandEntityHelper` class provides specialized methods for interacting with armor stand entities in Minecraft. Armor stands are decorative entities that can be customized with different poses, visibility settings, and equipment. This helper allows you to query and manipulate various properties of armor stands including their pose, visibility, physical characteristics, and limb rotations.
overview: This class inherits all methods from `LivingEntityHelper` and `EntityHelper`, providing access to standard entity operations like positioning, health tracking, and world interaction, in addition to armor stand-specific functionality.

constructors.description: ArmorStandEntityHelper instances are not typically created directly by scripters. Instead, they are obtained by casting a generic `EntityHelper` instance (e.g., using `entity.as()`) or from entity-related events when the entity type is `minecraft:armor_stand`. This conceptual constructor represents the wrapping of an existing `Entity` object that is an armor stand.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The base entity instance that is an Armor Stand.

methods.name: isVisible
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is currently visible. Invisible armor stands still exist but are not rendered.

methods.name: isSmall
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is a small (child-sized) variant.

methods.name: hasArms
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand has visible arms.

methods.name: hasBasePlate
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand has a base plate.

methods.name: isMarker
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is in marker mode. Marker armor stands have no collision box.

methods.name: getHeadRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's head as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.

methods.name: getBodyRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's body as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.

methods.name: getLeftArmRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's left arm as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.

methods.name: getRightArmRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's right arm as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.

methods.name: getLeftLegRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's left leg as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.

methods.name: getRightLegRotation
methods.description: Gets the current rotation of the armor stand's right leg as an array `[yaw, pitch, roll]` in degrees.
